title: Hypertension Treatment Protocol
content: Hypertension management aims to reduce cardiovascular risk through blood pressure control. Lifestyle modifications including sodium restriction, DASH diet, physical activity, and weight management are foundational. Pharmacological therapy typically begins with thiazide diuretics, ACE inhibitors, ARBs, or calcium channel blockers based on patient characteristics. Blood pressure targets are generally <130/80 mmHg for most adults.
